blogPost.excerpt: Dreambook is simply a database specially created for your dreams. Without thinking of limitation, save your dreams, analyze them. After you start using Dreambook, with the upcoming features and updates you will have more than you expect from your dreams.
blogPost.body: Dreambook is simply a database specially created for your dreams. Without thinking of limitation, save your dreams, analyze them. After you start using Dreambook, with the upcoming features and updates you will have more than you expect from your dreams.
blogPost.title: Dreambook - Dream journal, interpreter and tracker
blogPost.author: Ahmet Sülek

localize.description: 梦境簿只是一个专门为您的梦境建立的数据库。不考虑任何限制，保存你的梦境，分析它们。当您开始使用Dreambook后，随着即将到来的功能和更新，您将从您的梦想中获得更多的东西。
localize.tagline: 梦境日记、解释者和追踪者

localize.description: 夢境簿只是一個專門爲您的夢境建立的數據庫。不考慮任何限制，保存你的夢境，分析它們。當您開始使用Dreambook後，隨着即將到來的功能和更新，您將從您的夢想中獲得更多的東西。
localize.tagline: 夢境日記、解釋者和追蹤者
